select * from (select t.id, t.package_name as name, t.py_simple_code, t.standard_amount, t.receivable_amount, t.discount, t.package_sort as sort, '1' as type, null as checkType from tj_package t where t.del_flag='0' and t.status='0' union all select m.id, m.combin_project_name as name, m.py_simple_code, m.standard_amount, m.standard_amount as receivableAmount, m.discount, m.project_sort as sort, '2' as type, m.check_type from tj_combination_project m where m.del_flag='0' and m.status='0' order by type, sort) temp
